title: Combat room

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Combat room is a room in Player-owned house, that can be built with 32 Construction and 25,000.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Combat room
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Combat room
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level32
Cost25,000
Door layout
Combat room

The Combat room is a room in Player-owned house, that can be built with 32 Construction and 25,000.

The main feature of this room is the combat arena, where a player can freely fight anyone within the arena without losing their items. If a player dies in the arena, they are simply teleported out of it to another place in the room.

There are 4 hotspots available:

  • Combat dummy space
  • Combat ring space
  • Decoration space
  • Storage space

Contents

  • 1 Combat dummy
  • 2 Combat ring
  • 3 Decoration
  • 4 Storage
